person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Pakistan beat New Zealand by 46 runs on Friday to take an unbeatable 2-0 lead in the three-match one-day series .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Person" entities are:

1. Pakistan - a country
2. New Zealand - a country
3. players (not specified) - individuals who are part of the Pakistan and New Zealand cricket teams.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure! Here are the entities that refer to "Person" in the given paragraph:

1. players (not specified) - individuals who are part of the Pakistan and New Zealand cricket teams.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the entities that refer to "Person" in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Person":

| Person |
| --- |
| players (not specified) | individuals who are part of the Pakistan and New Zealand cricket teams. |
